text: #CentralValley #NHPI #PacificIslanders email jeremiah@firminc.org to sign up for a #Pfizer #COVID19 #vaccine for Wed April 28 in #Fresno #CA & receive $50 grocery gift card + $30 Uber code! Sponsored by @EmpoweredPI Held at FIRM's vaccination event 2630 E Weldon Ave, Fresno https://t.co/u9tcR28K72
